attributes.action: Ban all MPs from membership of any political party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an MPs primary function to represent the views and wishes of his or her constituents in parliament.  Membership of any political party is in direct conflict with this, as all MPs believe themselves to be obliged to act in favour of their party's views.  The whipping system compounds this.  MPs should be free to represent the people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
